channel.title: Robotics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorithms.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorithms.

item.title: A robot walks on water thanks to evolution’s solution
item.description: A structure like those found on water striders’ legs keeps a robot out of the water.

item.title: Robots eating other robots: The benefits of machine metabolism
item.description: If you define “metabolism” loosely enough, these robots may have one.

item.title: Experimental surgery performed by AI-driven surgical robot
item.description: In experimental surgery on pig organs, the robot performed well.
